details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-3:2012 - 6.8 Embedded files - AFRelationship
details.description: The file specification dictionary shall contain key AFRelationship of type Name identifying the relationship between the embedded file and the content of the document

rule.description: The file specification dictionary shall contain key AFRelationship of type Name identifying the relationship between the embedded file and the content of the document

error.message: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file does not contain the AFRelationship key or it has invalid value type
